TopicTitle: Laptop specs good enough for KSP?

Articles.Content:
Hello,

I am considering buying a better laptop which will mostly be used for web browsing and photo/video editing. While I won't really be using the laptop for gaming, the ability to run KSP factors into my decision somewhat.

One of the laptops I am considering is the Acer Aspire E5-573G which has the following specs:

 

Intel i5-4210u processor 1.7ghz - 2.7ghz (turbo)

Nvidia GeForce 920m

4.0 GB of RAM (which I may upgrade to 8.0GB)

 

I would be satisfied with around 30 FPS at 1366x768 medium to high settings. Would this be achievable? What sort of performance should I expect?

Many thanks,

Luke

 

Edited February 22, 2016 by LBG
